subject: If anyone is interested I have 4 extra old model 12-470's  available
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey guy's if anyone wants a 12-470 old style white and silver the 
modifyable model. I have four extra, who ever wants one e-mail me and 
you can have it for what I paid 40.00+ shipping and I'll send it to you.

I guess the only fair way to do it is the first four e-mails gets it.
1 per customer. paranormalinvestigating@...

Bruce
